attributes.action: change job law to set overtime payments/days in lieu by the law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently overtime is not guaranteed by the law so employers abuse their employees by asking them to work overtime for free. This should change because
- employers have benefits from overtime work [work is dome, customer charged for it but employee has nothing...]
- this will improve employees' life standard 
- justice - it is just unjust when one must work for free while employer takes all benefits from ones' work...

Please support this as many employees are working overtime for free [no payment and no days in lieu]
